input_structure.dest: Bytef* - destination buffer for compressed data
input_structure.destLen: uLongf* - pointer to destination buffer size/actual compressed size
input_structure.source: const Bytef* - source data to compress

side_effects: writes compressed data to dest buffer
constraints: destination buffer must be large enough (use compressBound())
equivalent to compress2() with Z_DEFAULT_COMPRESSION level

input_generation: various source data sizes (0, small, large, boundary values)
different data patterns (zeros, random, repetitive, compressible)
buffer size edge cases (exact, too small, oversized)
